Keywords: Fantastic Four , Marvel Knights , Midnight Sons , Mystical
Real Name: Danny Ketch
Special Powers
A NEW KIND OF FANTASTIC TEAMWORK: When Ghost Rider hits with a close attack, until your next turn other friendly characters with the Fantastic Four keyword can use Exploit Weakness.
THE NEW FANTASTIC FOUR: Passenger: 1, but only to carry characters with the Fantastic Four keyword. // Once per turn, when Ghost Rider is carried and placed adjacent to 2+ opposing characters, after resolutions he may make a close attack.
NO HIDING FROM JUDGEMENT: Penetrating/Psychic Blast, [Improved Targeting: Hindering]. When making a range attack, if Ghost Rider's line of fire crosses hindering terrain, modify attack and damage +1.

February 2, 2021
OsArkady
[QUOTE=SuperStolte;12109139]To further clarify, the reason you can use flurry and bcf is because bcf doesn't require the use of a close action you just need to make a melee attack.[/QUOTE] No, to use BCF you need to do a CLOSE action first: [QUOTE]Blades/Claws/Fangs: When this character hits and would deal normal damage during a CLOSE action, you may roll a d6. If you do, deal damage equal to the result instead of normal damage. Minimum result is this character’s printed damage value -1.[/QUOTE] You can't use BCF with any melee attack, there has to have been a CLOSE.
February 1, 2021
SuperStolte
To further clarify, the reason you can use flurry and bcf is because bcf doesn't require the use of a close action you just need to make a melee attack.
February 1, 2021
hoojeebo
Absolutely not, at least not with the current rules. Both Quake and Exploit Weakness require their own CLOSE action to activate, which means they cannot be combined.
